p: Stock culture of strains Cmm CREA-DC 1785 (Cmm) and Rs NCPPB (The National Collection of Plant Pathogenic Bacteria) 325 T (Rs, phylotype I) isolated from tomato were conserved as lyophilised in the CREA-DC collection (CREA-DC, Rome, Italy). Both were regenerated and checked for purity on nutrient agar 0.25% d-glucose (NAG) for 48 h (25 ± 2 °C for Cmm, 28 ± 2 °C for Rs).
